name: Together We Are Strong
description:
The story of a friendship between a lonely boy and a rejected robot.

How to play the game:

Movement - WASD

Walk/Run - Left Shift

Enter/Exit attack mode - Space

On attack mode you can:

Shoot - Left mouse button (Hold for more power)

Punch - Rigth mouse button

Have Fun!

We recommend the download for a better game quality.

Development Team:

Mayara Cechinatto - Coding

Bruno Paese Pressanto - Modelling and Animation

Marcial Lincoln - Coding

Adriano Gomes da Silva - Music

Vinícius S. Silva - Music
